REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2104 reute d f BC-POP-RADIO-<POPX>-GETS 03-19 0055

TEXT.TITLE: POP RADIO <POPX> GETS RITE AID <RAD>
TEXT.BODY: POP Radio Corp said it has signed a seven-year agreement to provide Rite Aid Corp with in-store customized disc jocky-hosted radio programs, resulting in an increase of more than 50 pct in the total number of stores POP now has under contract. Value was not disclosed. Reuter
